context.unit: Italian XX Mobile Corps (XX Corpo d'Armata Motorizzato)
context.discrepancy_type: Quarter mismatch - Informal vs Formal establishment status

seed_says.source_quality: Tier 1 (US Army CMH, Imperial War Museum, Operation Crusader OOBs)

agent_found.notes: Ariete Division (XX Corps primary unit) arrived January 1941 and fought at Tobruk Q2. Formal corps HQ may have been established later.

decision_1.question: Should the autonomous orchestrator extract XX Mobile Corps for 1941-Q2 despite the quarter discrepancy?

options.label: EXTRACT Q2 AS INFORMAL UNIT
options.description: Accept seed authority. Extract XX Corps for Q2 as 'informal/transitional' status, noting formal establishment in Q3. Extract again for Q3+ with formal status.
options.impact: Captures Q2 Tobruk operations, respects seed data, creates Q2 historical snapshot
options.effort: HIGH - Additional source research needed for Q2 informal structure

options.label: SKIP Q2, EXTRACT Q3 ONLY
options.description: Accept agent finding. Skip Q2 extraction, only extract XX Corps starting Q3 with formal establishment.
options.impact: Cleaner data, one establishment date, but contradicts 95%-confidence seed data

options.label: RESEARCH PRIMARY SOURCES
options.description: Pause for primary source research. Seek Italian/German archives to establish ground truth for Q2 status.
options.impact: Resolves definitively, highest data quality, creates precedent

options.label: FLAG FOR FUTURE RESOLUTION
options.description: Document discrepancy, proceed without Q2 extraction, revisit during quality improvement phase.
options.impact: Doesn't block work, honest about uncertainty, but leaves gap

for_q2_extraction: Seed explicitly lists Tobruk siege battles in Q2
Ariete Division (XX Corps primary unit) present and fighting Q2
Historical precedent: Italian corps often informal before formal HQ
Seed compiled by authoritative institutions (US Army CMH, Imperial War Museum)
against_q2_extraction: No primary Italian documents located for Q2 structure
Formal HQ establishment may postdate subordinate units' operations
Risk of speculating about informal structure without evidence

recommended_decision.reasoning: Seed data is authoritative (95% Tier 1) and explicit about Q2 battle participation. Historical reality shows Italian formations often operated before formal establishment. Recommend extraction with 'informal/transitional' status note. Pattern database will learn from this decision to automate similar future cases.

user_action_required.step_4: Provide reasoning for decision (brief sentence or paragraph)

decision_template.reasoning: [Your explanation for why you chose this option]
decision_template.pattern_learning: [Should this decision apply to similar future cases? Yes/No]
